name: Sakneen
headline: Shopify for Real Estate Developers

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e728950467cc5e8d066872_sakneen-white-logo.svg)](http://www.sakneen.com/</>)
[Solutions](http://www.sakneen.com/<#Solutions>)[Pricing](http://www.sakneen.com/<#Early-Access>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e7301aab88b83a7ebf72fb_Sakneen_Logo_FV%20copy%20\(1\)%20\(1\).png)
# Digital
# Sales
# Tools
# For Real Estate Developers
Display all your inventory on a map reflecting availability from your CRM. We enable online payments and the distribution of inventory across your sales teams.
[Request Demo](http://www.sakneen.com/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/Fp7nd2Nq>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719246_Macbook%20Image.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/6530fc54e1bdcaa4a9bf210e_SakneenHero-5.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/6522bad6e11cc8a45fc35935_image-blue.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719248_Hero%20Blur.webp)
## Seamless Sales Experience
Sell and close transactions from anywhere and at any time. From TV screens to tablets as well as on mobile phones on the go, you're always one click away from closing a sale.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652293ed7b09c48d75af0c94_Actions.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652ea366e35f005aac0c426f_Iphone%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571924e_Iphone%20Screen%20Image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571924c_Iphone%20BG%20Image.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571924f_Eye%20Icon.svg)
Real Customer Statistics
14 Days to Launch
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719251_Arrow%20Right%20Up.svg)
Maximum time to onboard and launch a developer is within 14 days of signing with Sakneen
65hrs Saved
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719251_Arrow%20Right%20Up.svg)
One-click offer generation saved 65 hours in one month for one of our developers across a sales team by instantly issuing 250+ customer offers
99% Usage
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719251_Arrow%20Right%20Up.svg)
Almost all of of customer's sales team members use Sakneen on a weekly basis to stay updated on inventory, payment plans, and deliver a world-class sales experience to customers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719252_Left%20Arrow.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c5719253_Right%20Arrow.svg)
## Some of our Partners
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652294e57ea9a737daa9a761_Sodic.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652294f57ef8e5244a3fcb40_Marakez%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/65229502cb2aec6e4ecf184b_Horizon.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652295157c23f39276afeac1_Interia.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652e86015e76c03c2979577a_CGP-Grey.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/65229521a2e59a440d01551f_Lasirena.png)
# Supercharge your Sales Team
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652bb9c9b52b8f9549031ee8_Real%20Time%20Availability.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571925b_Blue%20Blur.webp)
Real Time Inventory
We synchronize with your systems to make sure your inventory is always up to date
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652bc284e51ee095a8c96c10_Filter.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571925d_Orange%20Blur.jpg)
Instant Filter & Search
No matter how specific the request, you will be able to instantly search through thousands of properties
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652bc275b05ba5609d845d9e_Generate%20Offer.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571925b_Blue%20Blur.webp)
One-Click Offer Generation
Instantly create offers for all your clients - no more copy pasting offers together
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/652bc267b05ba5609d844fef_Reservation.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e721cf88eda1d4c5718f83/64e721d388eda1d4c571925d_Orange%20Blur.jpg)
Enable Online Payments
Your sales team can now reserve units from anywhere with local and international clients 
# Plans for Every Developer, Choose Yours 
Sakneen offers a range of pricing plans to fit every budget and inventory size. Whether you're working on a single project, or several mega projects, we have a plan that's right for you.

generated_description:
### Sakneen Overview

**Company Name:** Sakneen  
**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** Cairo, Egypt  
**Team Size:** 9 Employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W20  
**Website:** [sakneen.com](http://www.sakneen.com)  
**Mission:** To be the Shopify for real estate developers.  

Sakneen is all about digital transformation in the real estate sector. They provide a comprehensive software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform to streamline sales for developers. Think of them as a powerful toolkit designed specifically for real estate businesses, allowing them to operate more efficiently and connect better with customers.

### What They Do

Sakneen focuses on creating seamless digital sales experiences. Their platform includes features like:

- **Interactive Inventory Management:** Developers can display their inventory on a map linked to their CRM, reflecting real-time availability.
- **Online Payments:** Sales teams can now facilitate transactions from anywhere, whether they're in the office or on the go.
- **One-Click Offer Generation:** They help save time by allowing developers to instantly create offers for clients, eliminating the tedious process of copying and pasting.
- **Real-Time Updates:** Your inventory stays updated as data syncs directly with existing systems.

### Notable Achievements

- **Quick Onboarding:** They can onboard and launch a developer in as little as 14 days.
- **Significant Time Savings:** One client reported saving 65 hours in a month due to Sakneen’s one-click offer generation.
- **High Engagement:** An impressive 99% of their clients' sales teams utilize the platform weekly.

### Pricing Plans

Sakneen offers various pricing plans tailored to meet the needs of different developers, whether they are working on a single project or managing multiple large-scale ones. Popular options include:

- **Basic Plan:** Designed for one project with real-time inventory tracking and one-click offer generation.
- **Complete Plan:** Covers multiple projects, includes advanced features, support, CRM integration, and allows for unlimited users.

### Partnerships

Sakneen has built relationships with several partners in the industry, including major developers like Sodic and Marakez, enhancing their credibility and reach.

### Conclusion

If you’re a real estate developer looking to enhance your sales processes through technology, Sakneen might just be the partner you need. With a focus on digital tools designed for your specific needs, they empower developers to sell smarter and faster. So, why wait? Explore what Sakneen has to offer and get started on transforming your real estate business today.
